title: [Large-scale] Customized AI English Learning: Mobile Microlearning for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills (Varied by Participant)
context.additional_context: A course where science professionals learn situational English expressions required in their work environments. It applies an AI-based learning system optimized for smartphone-only access.

learning_goals: Learners can use 500 core English expressions required for science-related work situations with 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance individual learning efficiency by 30% through personalized learning path recommendations by a deep learning-based system.

Learners will complete a portfolio of 5+ English communication outputs (emails, reports, presentations) applicable to real work environments through AI project-based assessments (3+ scenarios: data analysis, model development), meeting at least 3 out of 4 institutional rubric criteria (clarity, professionalism, practicality, collaboration).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
